transcripts.text: IT HAPPENED TUESDAY AFTERNOON AT THE LAST STOP FOR THE NUMBER 4 TRAIN IN THE WOODLAWN SECTION OF THE BRONX.  THE WOMAN WAS WALKING OFF THE TRAIN WHEN THE DOORS CLOSED ON HER.  RIDERS WALKING ALONG THE PLATFORM SEEMINGLY IGNORE HER.  AN MTA WORKER IS FINALLY SEEN ON VIDEO AS SHE HEADS TO THE CONDUCTOR'S CAB TO OPEN THE DOORS TO FREE THE WOMAN.  Thank you.  Don't bother to hold it any longer.
